sentences.sContent: It is easy to have an opinion on a moral issue like the death penalty for murder.
sentences.sCn: 对于判谋杀犯死刑这种涉及伦理道德的问题，有个观点并非难事。

sentences.sContent: If we accept that certain babies should be allowed to die, we place doctors in a moral dilemma .
sentences.sCn: 如果我们同意应该允许某些婴儿死去，那就是让医生在道德上处于两难境地了。

sentences.sContent: Man is gifted with a moral sense by which he distinguishes good from evil.
sentences.sCn: 人类天生有道德意识，能区分善与恶。

sentences.sContent: ...It will be possible to create more sophisticated moral machines...
